00048     $_SESSION['Locale'] = $_POST['Locale'];

00076 function cwwui_syslog($prio, $file, $func, $line, $msg)
00077 {
00078     global $LOG_LEVEL, $LOG_PRIOS;
00079 
00080     try {
00081         openlog("cwwui", LOG_PID, LOG_LOCAL0);
00082         
00083         if ($prio <= $LOG_LEVEL) {
00084             $useratip= $_SESSION['USER'].'@'.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
00085             $func= $func == '' ? 'NA' : $func;
00086             $log= "$LOG_PRIOS[$prio] $useratip $file: $func ($line): $msg\n";
00087             if (!syslog($prio, $log)) {
00088                 if (!fwrite(STDERR, $log)) {
00089                     echo $log;
00090                 }
00091             }
00092         }
00093         closelog();
00094     }
00095     catch (Exception $e) {
00096         echo 'Caught exception: ',  $e->getMessage(), "\n";
00097         echo "cwwui_syslog() failed: $prio, $file, $func, $line, $msg\n";
00098         // No need to closelog(), it is optional
00099     }
00100 }
00101 
00108 function LogUserOut($reason= 'User logged out')
00109 {
00110     cwwui_syslog(LOG_INFO, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, $reason);
00111     $_SESSION['USER']= 'loggedout';
00113     $_SESSION['Timeout']= -1;
00114     session_write_close();
00115 
00116     header('Location: /index.php');
00117     exit;
00118 }
00119 
00129 function Authentication($passwd)
00130 {
00131     global $ALL_USERS, $SessionTimeout, $View;
00132 
00133     cwwui_syslog(LOG_DEBUG, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Login attempt');
00134 
00135     if (!in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $ALL_USERS)) {
00136         cwwui_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Not a valid user');
00137         // Throttle authentication failures
00138         exec('/bin/sleep 5');
00139         LogUserOut('Authentication failed');
00140     }
00141 
00142     if (!$View->Controller($Output, 'CheckAuthentication', $_SESSION['USER'], sha1($passwd))) {
00143         cwwui_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Password mismatch');
00144         // Throttle authentication failures
00145         exec('/bin/sleep 5');
00146         LogUserOut('Authentication failed');
00147     }
00148     cwwui_syslog(LOG_DEBUG, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Authentication succeeded');
00149 
00150     // Update session timeout now, otherwise in the worst case scenario, vars.php may log user out on very close session timeout
00151     $_SESSION['Timeout']= time() + $SessionTimeout;
00152     
00153     header("Location: /system/index.php");
00154     exit;
00155 }

00166 {
00167     global $LOCALES;
00168     // Unindent these html lines, against the project style guidelines, otherwise they are indented in page source too
00169 ?>
00170 <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
00171 <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
00172     <head>
00173         <title><?php echo _MENU('ComixWall Administration Interface') ?></title>
00174         <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=<?php echo $LOCALES[$_SESSION['Locale']]['Codeset'] ?>" />
00175         <meta name="description" content="ComixWall Internet Security Gateway" />
00176         <meta name="author" content="Soner Tari"/>
00177         <meta name="keywords" content="ComixWall, Internet, Security, Gateway, :)" />
00178         <link rel="stylesheet" href="../comixwall.css" type="text/css" media="screen" />
00179         <?php
00180         if ($reloadrate !== 0) {
00181             ?>
00182             <meta http-equiv="refresh" content="<?php echo $reloadrate ?>" />
00183             <?php
00184         }
00185         ?>
00186     </head>
00187     <body style="background: <?php echo $color ?>;">
00188         <table>
00189         <?php

00210 function SetTopMenu($view, $default= 'info.php')
00211 {
00212     if ($_SESSION[$view]['topmenu']) {
00213         $topmenu= $_SESSION[$view]['topmenu'];
00214     }
00215     else {
00216         $topmenu= $default;
00217     }
00218 
00219     $_SESSION[$view]['topmenu']= $topmenu;
00220     return $topmenu;
00221 }
00222 
00228 function SetSubmenu($default)
00229 {
00230     global $View, $Modules;
00231 
00232     $page= basename($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']);
00233 
00234     if ($_GET['submenu']) {
00235         if (array_key_exists($_GET['submenu'], $Modules[$View->Model]['SubMenus'][$page])) {
00236             $Submenu= $_GET['submenu'];
00237             $_SESSION[$View->Model][$page]['submenu']= $Submenu;
00238         }
00239         else {
00240             cwwui_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "No such submenu for $View->Model>$page: ".$_GET['submenu']);
00241             echo _TITLE2('Resource not available').": $page?submenu=".$_GET['submenu'];
00242             exit(1);
00243         }
00244     }
00245 
00246     if ($_SESSION[$View->Model][$page]['submenu']) {
00247         $Submenu= $_SESSION[$View->Model][$page]['submenu'];
00248     }
00249     else {
00250         $Submenu= $default;
00251     }
00252 
00253     $_SESSION[$View->Model][$page]['submenu']= $Submenu;
00254     return $Submenu;
00255 }
